about_the_game:
Step into the World of Dance Dash

Stomp the beats in this pulse-pounding, full body sensory symphony on your PC with webcam or VR Headset! Craft your own rhythm, groove to community maps, music, and mods. FREE DEMO.

Your Gateway to Full Body Tracking

FREE full body tracking with any mobile device, in-game YouTube dance videos and music videos to learn cool moves from the Pros.

BUST A MOVE

Dance Dash features intuitive mechanics like ducking, dodging, jumping, hitting, and especially shuffling, making it easy to play and highly engaging. Choreograph your most treasured tunes, and let the world know how you rock!

PLAY ANYTIME, ANYWHERE

Dance Dash is designed to be user-friendly and easily playable on both PC and big screen TVs, providing a seamless and immersive experience. With simple setup and intuitive controls, players can enjoy full-body VR gaming in the comfort of their living rooms or home offices.

DD Editor to Create, Share, and Connect

Dive into the DD Editor, to upload and view videos in-game, explore new tags and categories, and experience enhanced performance. Full mod capability is coming in June, offering endless customization options.

Explore, Dance, and Grow

Dance Dash isn’t just a game; it’s a community. Join our vibrant community of over 2,000 members and 10,000+ players from countries all over the world: ! Enjoy in-game YouTube dance and music videos, connect with fellow dancers. With Engine empower cross-platform play, the dance floor is always open.

Get ready to move, create, and connect in Dance Dash. Your dance journey starts now!

Official website:

Contact Support: dancedash@rebuffreality.com
detailed_description:
FULL BODY TRACKING WITHOUT LIMITS

No Full Body Tracking? NO PROBLEM! Play Dance Dash on PC with any webcam or phone, an AI powered camera-based full body tracking solution from Rebuff Reality.


About the Game

Step into the World of Dance Dash

Stomp the beats in this pulse-pounding, full body sensory symphony on your PC with webcam or VR Headset! Craft your own rhythm, groove to community maps, music, and mods. FREE DEMO.

Your Gateway to Full Body Tracking

FREE full body tracking with any mobile device, in-game YouTube dance videos and music videos to learn cool moves from the Pros.

BUST A MOVE

Dance Dash features intuitive mechanics like ducking, dodging, jumping, hitting, and especially shuffling, making it easy to play and highly engaging. Choreograph your most treasured tunes, and let the world know how you rock!

PLAY ANYTIME, ANYWHERE

Dance Dash is designed to be user-friendly and easily playable on both PC and big screen TVs, providing a seamless and immersive experience. With simple setup and intuitive controls, players can enjoy full-body VR gaming in the comfort of their living rooms or home offices.

DD Editor to Create, Share, and Connect

Dive into the DD Editor, to upload and view videos in-game, explore new tags and categories, and experience enhanced performance. Full mod capability is coming in June, offering endless customization options.

Explore, Dance, and Grow

Dance Dash isn’t just a game; it’s a community. Join our vibrant community of over 2,000 members and 10,000+ players from countries all over the world: ! Enjoy in-game YouTube dance and music videos, connect with fellow dancers. With Engine empower cross-platform play, the dance floor is always open.

Get ready to move, create, and connect in Dance Dash. Your dance journey starts now!

name: Dance Dash

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1 or later, Windows 10, Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Quad Core 3 Ghz +
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 or Better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • VR Support: Open XR and SteamVR
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1 or later, Windows 10, Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Quad Core 3 Ghz +
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 2080 or AMD Radeon RX 6600
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • VR Support: Open XR and SteamVR

reviews:
“Very fun game for legs day. Great leg workout!”
— VR Hidden Fitness Games

“Dance Dash is the remedy! Slide to rhythm and shuffle, shuffle, shuffle!”
— The Gaming Consultant

“Most intense exergame workout, try a dancing game Dance Dash!”
— THE WALL STREET JOURNAL
short_description: Arcade-style rhythm pumping FREE FULL BODY TRACKING on VR & PC. Empowered by mobile/webcam AI tracking. Groove to 100s of community songs and maps IN-GAME plus viral dance videos and MVs.
